casebody.data:
Kuhnle, Special Admr., Appellant, v. Zander et al.; Allstate Insurance Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Kuhnle v. Zander, 103 Ohio St.3d 474, 2004-Ohio-5699.]

(No. 2004-0164 Submitted October 13, 2004 Decided November 10, 2004.) Schuller Law Office, Raymond H. Pittman III and Allison M. Taylor, for appellant. Vassar, Dills, Dawson & Bonfiglio, Paul R. Bonfíglio and Keith J. Winterhalter, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Kyle v. Buckeye Union Ins. Co., 103 Ohio St.3d 170, 2004-Ohio-4885, 814 N.E.2d 1195.

Moyer, C.J., Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., concur. Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
